channel.title: iOS on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in iOS on My New Hugo Site

item.title: iOS programming
item.description: View A view is also a responder (UIView is a subclass of UIResponder). This means that a view is subject to user interactions, such as taps and swipes. Thus, views are the basis not only of the interface that the user sees, but also of the interface that the user touches The Window and Root View The top of the view hierarchy is the appâ€™s window. It is an instance of UIWindow (or your own subclass thereof), which is a UIView subclass.
